${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:LowStakes.NAME: Low Stakes
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, discard any number of cards then draw that many.

${modID}:HeadsUp.NAME: Heads Up
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn.

${modID}:NestEgg.NAME: Nest Egg
${modID}:NestEgg.FLAVOR: Some extra cash for on the way.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b300 #yGold at the start of the run.

${modID}:YouGetWhatYouGet.NAME: You Get What You Get
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn gain #b2 #yGold for each card in hand. Gain no #yGold in combat rewards.

${modID}:CardPlayer.NAME: Card Player
${modID}:CardPlayer.FLAVOR: Is this the reward you are looking for?
DESCRIPTIONS: On Card Reward screens you have #b2 additional cards to choose from. Lose [E] at the start of your turn.

${modID}:Cartomancy.NAME: Cartomancy
${modID}:Cartomancy.FLAVOR: Everybody needs a little bit of magic.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain an extra #yPotion slot and #b2 #yDuplication #yPotions.

${modID}:Astronomy.NAME: Astronomy
${modID}:Astronomy.FLAVOR: You'll end up grading everything with stickers.
DESCRIPTIONS: After you play a card, #yUpgrade it for this combat. Lose a #yPotion slot.

${modID}:Clairvoyance.NAME: Clairvoyance
${modID}:Clairvoyance.FLAVOR: Don't turn as gray as a ghost.
DESCRIPTIONS: Combat rewards can now contain #yColorless cards. Choose a #yRare #yColorless card at the start of the run.

${modID}:Flushed.NAME: Flushed
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have not played any #yPowers during your turn, gain an extra [E] next turn.

${modID}:Retrograde.NAME: Retrograde
${modID}:Retrograde.FLAVOR: Quick check if everything is ready.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yUpgrade half of your deck.

${modID}:ROI.NAME: ROI
${modID}:ROI.FLAVOR: Lift the shop to new heights.
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards in shops are #yUpgraded. #yPotions in the shops are at least #yUncommon. Guarantee one #yRare card in the shop.

${modID}:BigHands.NAME: Big Hands
${modID}:BigHands.FLAVOR: Believe in the hands of fate.
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b2 additional cards each turn. On Card Reward screens, you have #b1 less card to choose from.

${modID}:HighStakes.NAME: High Stakes
DESCRIPTIONS: After selecting a Boss relic, gain another random Boss relic.

${modID}:RuleBender.NAME: Rule Bender
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an #yAttack is played, gain half of the damage as #yBlock. #bALL enemies have double their health.

${modID}:Shattered.NAME: Shattered
DESCRIPTIONS: Start with a random deck of #b20 cards.
Your shattered deck.

${modID}:OverstockPlus.NAME: Overstock Plus
DESCRIPTIONS: Show three additional relics in the shop.

${modID}:Liquidation.NAME: Liquidation
DESCRIPTIONS: 50% discount on all products!

${modID}:GlowUp.NAME: Glow Up
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a random Legendary card to your deck.

${modID}:RerollGlut.NAME: Reroll Glut
DESCRIPTIONS: Click to reroll the cards in the shop, costs 50 per roll.

${modID}:OmenGlobe.NAME: Omen Globe
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you use a potion in combat, get a random Colorless card.

${modID}:Observatory.NAME: Observatory
DESCRIPTIONS: Upgrade 4 cards.

${modID}:NachoTong.NAME: Nacho Tong
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn.

${modID}:Recyclomancy.NAME: Recyclomancy
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you discard 5 cards, gain 10 Block.

${modID}:TarotTycoon.NAME: Tarot Tycoon
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you use a potion, gain 50 Gold.

${modID}:PlanetTycoon.NAME: Planet Tycoon
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a Common card to your deck, it is Upgraded.

${modID}:MoneyTree.NAME: Money Tree
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase the maximum Gold earned in combat to 400.

${modID}:Antimatter.NAME: Antimatter
DESCRIPTIONS: Future card rewards have 1 additional card to choose from.

${modID}:Illusion.NAME: Illusion
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose and add a Common, Uncommon and Rare card to your deck.

${modID}:Petroglyph.NAME: Petroglyph
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce the max health of all enemies by 10%.

${modID}:Retcon.NAME: Retcon
DESCRIPTIONS: Click to reroll a Blind, costs 50 Gold per roll.

${modID}:Palette.NAME: Palette
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.
